itineraries.name: City Tour
activities: Walking tour of the historic center, visits to main museums, lunch at a local restaurant

comments.comment: Great experience, the guide really knew the history of the city.- Maria G.
Very comprehensive tour to see the highlights in a short time.- Pedro S.

itineraries.name: Mountain Hiking
activities: uided mountain hike, visits to viewpoints, outdoor picnic.

comments.comment: The views from the summit were spectacular! - Juana R.
Wear good shoes and comfortable clothes but the effort is worth it. - Esteban C.

itineraries.name: Food Tour
activities: Walking tour of markets and restaurants, tastings of typical dishes.

comments.comment: The best way to discover the city's cuisine, everything was delicious! - Luis G.
Leaving this tour hungry is impossible, I highly recommend it! - Marta S.

itineraries.name: Flavors of the Past
activities: Explore the old town, taste traditional dishes.

comments.comment: An incredible experience, I learned so much about the history of local food. Highly recommended! - Ana R.
The flavors were authentic and delightful; I'll definitely be back. - Luis M.

itineraries.name: Tapas under the Stars
activities: Visit local bars, savor tapas and wines.

comments.comment: A fun and delicious night; the tapas were amazing! - Marta S.
I discovered some great places I would never have found on my own. - Carlos D.

itineraries.name: Sweet Delights
activities: Explore the best pastry shops and cafes in the city.

comments.comment: A perfect tour for sweet lovers; the desserts were divine. - Elena P.
I loved every bite of this experience. I'll definitely do it again! - David L.

itineraries.name: Green and Vital
activities: Discover vegan and healthy options at restaurants and markets.

comments.comment: Even if you're not vegan, this tour is a delight. The options were delicious! - Laura G.
I was pleasantly surprised by the variety and taste of vegan food. - Marcos C.

itineraries.name: Seafood Delights
activities: Visit the harbor, sample fresh seafood.

comments.comment: A feast of fresh seafood; I can't wait to go back. - Andrea M.
This tour made me appreciate the flavors of the sea even more. - Pedro R.

itineraries.name: Flavors of the World
activities: Explore ethnic restaurants and savor dishes from different cultures.

comments.comment: A global culinary adventure; I felt like I had traveled the world. - Maria V.
Ethnic food has always been a mystery to me, but now I love it! - Juan S.

itineraries.name: Cheeses and Vines
activities: Pair cheeses and wines at local wineries.

comments.comment: A gourmet experience; the pairings were surprisingly good. - Sofia L.
If you love cheese and wine, this tour is a dream come true. - Diego G.
The authenticity of street food left me speechless. - Laura M.
This tour showed me the culinary heart of the city. - Alejandro S.

itineraries.name: Chocolatíssimos
activities: Visit chocolate shops and specialized cafes.

comments.comment: A chocolate and coffee paradise; I loved every stop! - Carolina R.
Chocolate and coffee lovers can't miss this tour. - Pablo D.

itineraries.name: Exquisite Viniculture
activities: Enjoy wine tastings at local wineries.

comments.comment: An educational wine experience with exceptional tastings. - Carla S.
I became a wine lover after this tour. - Antonio M.

itineraries.name: Flavors of the World
activities: Explore ethnic restaurants and try dishes from different cultures.

itineraries.name: Cheeses and Strains
activities: Cheese and wine pairing at local wineries.

comments.comment: I participated in the 'Vinícola Exquisita' wine tasting tour, and it was an exceptional experience.
The wine tastings were the highlight of the tour.
